title: A COVID-19 'Silver Bullet'? | Guest: Dr. Richard Bartlett | 8/10/20
description:
A former State Department official believes he may have organized the conference where the deep state coup against Trump started. CNN’s Brian Stelter suggests that conservative talk radio is dangerous and out to get Joe Biden. Acclaimed doctor Richard Bartlett may have found the “silver bullet” for the coronavirus, and it’s a common respiratory medicine. Investigative journalist David Steinberg runs through his upcoming article that closes the case on Ilhan Omar: It’s almost certain she married her brother. Consumer advocate Harvey Rosenfield explains how our phone data is being used to create “secret surveillance scores.” Hyperinflation is coming after the Federal Reserve printed 90 years’ worth of currency in the past 90 days. 
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
